duties_responsibilities.duty: Take telephonic and online orders from Chef Central accounts such as restaurants, hotels, resorts, country clubs, casinos, colleges, universities, and healthcare organizations.
Manage customer orders, polling accounts for daily calls, coordinating deliveries, and interfacing with internal departments to meet customer needs.
Maintain high customer satisfaction, resolve problems, and provide support for field sales personnel.
Provide administrative support, filing, faxing, posting, heavy telephonic work, and work towards meeting/maintaining team sales goals.
Enjoy working in a fast-paced office environment and have a positive attitude.
Requires a minimum HS diploma; some college experience preferred, and 1 – 2 years previous experience in Food Service and/or the restaurant industry.

education_certification.credential: Minimum HS diploma; some college experience preferred.
